sentences.en: A festival was held in her honor every year at the vernal equinox.
sentences.cn: 每年的春分时刻都有为她举行的节日.

sentences.en: As the saying goes, " Vernal Equinox up wheat, fertilizer to keep up. "
sentences.cn: 俗话说 “ 春分麦起身, 肥水要紧跟 ”.

sentences.en: Everyone admired the young girl's vernal freshness.
sentences.cn: 大家都羡慕这女孩子的青春朝气.

sentences.en: He described the vernal migration of birds in detail.
sentences.cn: 他详细地描述了鸟的春季移居.

sentences.en: Most patients with allergic conjunctivitis in children are vernal keratoconjunctivitis.
sentences.cn: 儿童过敏性结膜炎以春季角结膜炎为主.

sentences.en: Smiling and enjoying the vernal sunshine!
sentences.cn: 扬起笑脸,沐浴这和煦的阳光.

sentences.en: The autumnal equinox is the point in the opposite direction of the vernal equinox.
sentences.cn: 与春分点相隔180°的另一点,就是秋分点.

sentences.en: The linnet chirps her vernal song.
sentences.cn: 红雀吱喳鸣叫着她春天的歌.

sentences.en: The vernal equinox and autumnal equinox herald the beginning of spring and fall, respectively.
sentences.cn: 春分和秋分, 分别预告着春季和秋季的开始.

sentences.en: The vernal work is now begun.
The zero point is the Vernal Equinox, also called the point of Aries.
sentences.cn: 零点是春分点, 也叫做白羊座点.

sentences.en: There a good one at Vernal Yamato in Vernal, but it's a bit far from here.
sentences.cn: 在维侬有家维侬大和餐厅很不错, 但是稍微远一点.

sentences.en: They are thought to have arisen with the celebrations of the vernal equinox.
sentences.cn: 人们认为他们是出自于庆祝春分的来临.

sentences.en: Zhu Wei's artwork Vernal Equinox No.12 is the only ink and wash in this exhibition.
sentences.cn: 朱伟的参展作品《开春图十二号》是本次展览中唯一的中国水墨画.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 春分；春分点（约在3月20日）

trans.tran_cn: 青春的，春季的，春天般的，温柔的
